thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text:
We wanted to go to New Zealand! Searched the web and found GoTravel. Did some research about the company to maje sure they were legitimate.
We booked a 27 day driving tour with GoTravel. This included arrangements for cars, transfers between north and south Island and hotels. The agent provided us several options. Everything went off without a hitch!! Very pleased with the agent "Vered". I had a few questions for her during the trip and she responded in no time!!! I would highly recommend GoTravel.
Johanne
